content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with current status EntityStatus.WORKING, fuel count of 0 coal, and 4 iron ore in inventory.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace without sufficient fuel
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel (coal) before inserting iron ore to maintain continuous operation.

### Errors when using the furnace without monitoring its status
- Regularly check the status of the furnace to ensure it is operational and has the necessary resources to function effectively.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace repeatedly without checking inventory
- Avoid inserting items into the furnace if it is already at capacity or if it lacks fuel; monitor the inventory levels before proceeding.
